languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс взирает на друкарское устройство, сжав губы в тонкую нить. Потом переводит взгляд на Идиру.{/n} "Госпожа Тласс..."
{n}Heinrix gazes at the Drukhari device, pressing his lips into a thin line. Then he shifts his gaze to Idira.{/n} "Mistress Tlass..."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс взирает на друкарское устройство, сжав губы в тонкую нить. Потом переводит взгляд на Идиру.{/n} "Госпожа Тласс..."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはデュカーリの装置を見つめ、細い線に唇を押し当てる。それから視線をイディラへと移す。{/n}「ミストレス・トラス…」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gazes at the Drukhari device, pressing his lips into a thin line. Then he shifts his gaze to Idira.{/n} "Mistress Tlass..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはデュカーリの装置を見つめ、細い線に唇を押し当てる。それから視線をイディラへと移す。{/n}「ミストレス・トラス…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希盯着这件黑暗灵族的装置，嘴唇抿成一条细线，随后转过头盯着伊迪拉。{/n}“特拉斯女士……”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gazes at the Drukhari device, pressing his lips into a thin line. Then he shifts his gaze to Idira.{/n} "Mistress Tlass..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希盯着这件黑暗灵族的装置，嘴唇抿成一条细线，随后转过头盯着伊迪拉。{/n}“特拉斯女士……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix observe le dispositif drukhari en pinçant les lèvres, puis il tourne son regard vers Idira.{/n} « Maîtresse Tlass... »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gazes at the Drukhari device, pressing his lips into a thin line. Then he shifts his gaze to Idira.{/n} "Mistress Tlass..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix observe le dispositif drukhari en pinçant les lèvres, puis il tourne son regard vers Idira.{/n} « Maîtresse Tlass... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix contempla el aparato Drukhari y condensa los labios en una fina línea. A continuación, dirige la mirada hacia Idira.{/n} «Señora Tlass...».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gazes at the Drukhari device, pressing his lips into a thin line. Then he shifts his gaze to Idira.{/n} "Mistress Tlass..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix contempla el aparato Drukhari y condensa los labios en una fina línea. A continuación, dirige la mirada hacia Idira.{/n} «Señora Tlass...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix betrachtet mit zusammengepressten Lippen das Drukhari-Gerät. Da wandert sein Blick zu Idira.{/n} "Herrin Tlass ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gazes at the Drukhari device, pressing his lips into a thin line. Then he shifts his gaze to Idira.{/n} "Mistress Tlass..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix betrachtet mit zusammengepressten Lippen das Drukhari-Gerät. Da wandert sein Blick zu Idira.{/n} "Herrin Tlass ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, ince bir çizgi oluşturana kadar dudaklarını sıkarken Drukhari cihazına bakıyor. Sonra bakışlarını İdira'ya çeviriyor.{/n} "Üstat Tlass..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gazes at the Drukhari device, pressing his lips into a thin line. Then he shifts his gaze to Idira.{/n} "Mistress Tlass..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, dudaklarını ince bir çizgi hâline gelene kadar sıkarken Drukhari cihazına bakıyor. Sonra bakışlarını İdira'ya çeviriyor.{/n} "Üstat Tlass..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
